00058 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPExpressionFileTest()
00059 {
00060         CHPData data;
00061         CHPFileReader reader;
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_expression_file"));
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00064 
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_expression_file");
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 10);
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00068 
00069         CHPExpressionEntry entry1;
00070         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 1");
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetDetection() == 10);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetDetectionPValue() == 11.0f);
00074         float signal = entry1.GetSignal();
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(signal == 17.8f);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNumPairs() == 6);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNumPairsUsed() == 5);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetChange() == 2);
00079         float chgPVal = entry1.GetChangePValue();
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(chgPVal == 56.9f);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatio() == 45.89f);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatioLo() == 42.0f);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetSigLogRatioHi() == 47.0f);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetCommonPairs() == 2);
00085 
00086         CHPExpressionEntry entry2;
00087         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 2");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetDetection() == 10);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetDetectionPValue() == 1.0f);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSignal() == 7.8f);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNumPairs() == 6);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNumPairsUsed() == 5);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetChange() == 2);
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetChangePValue() == 5.9f);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatio() == 4.89f);
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatioLo() == 2.0f);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetSigLogRatioHi() == 7.0f);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetCommonPairs() == 2);
00100 
00101         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00102         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00107 
00108         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00109         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPGenotypingFileTest()
00117 {
00118         CHPData data;
00119         CHPFileReader reader;
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_genotype_file"));
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00122 
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_genotype_file");
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00126 
00127         CHPGenotypeEntry entry1;
00128         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 1");
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetCall() == 1);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetConfidence() == 11.0f);
00132         float ras1 = entry1.GetRAS1();
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ras1 == 17.8f);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetRAS2() == 6.0f);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetAACall() == 5.0f);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetABCall() == 2.0f);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetBBCall() == 56.9f);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetNoCall() == 45.89f);
00139 
00140         CHPGenotypeEntry entry2;
00141         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetProbeSetName() == "probe set 2");
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetCall() == 2);
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetConfidence() == 1.0f);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetRAS1() == 7.8f);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetRAS2() == 6.0f);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetAACall() == 5.0f);
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetABCall() == 2.0f);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetBBCall() == 5.9f);
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetNoCall() == 4.8f);
00151 
00152         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00153         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00158 
00159         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00160         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00165 }

00167 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPUniversalFileTest()
00168 {
00169         CHPData data;
00170         CHPFileReader reader;
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_universal_file"));
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00173 
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_universal_file");
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 2);
00177 
00178         CHPUniversalEntry entry1;
00179         data.GetEntry(0, entry1);
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry1.GetBackground() == 11.0f);
00181 
00182         CHPUniversalEntry entry2;
00183         data.GetEntry(1, entry2);
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(entry2.GetBackground() == 1.0f);
00185 
00186         CHPBackgroundZone zone1;
00187         data.GetBackgroundZone(0, zone1);
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterX() == 11.0f);
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetCenterY() == 17.8f);
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetBackground() == 56.9f);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone1.GetSmoothFactor() == 45.89f);
00192 
00193         CHPBackgroundZone zone2;
00194         data.GetBackgroundZone(1, zone2);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterX() == 1.0f);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetCenterY() == 7.8f);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetBackground() == 6.9f);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zone2.GetSmoothFactor() == 5.89f);
00199 }

00201 void CHPFileReaderTest::ReadCHPReseqFileTest()
00202 {
00203         CHPData data;
00204         CHPFileReader reader;
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_reseq_file"));
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00207 
00208         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_reseq_file");
00209 
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 5);
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetBackgroundZoneCnt() == 1);
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetForceCnt() == 2);
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOrigCnt() == 3);
00214 
00215         const double eps = 1e-5;
00216         CHPReseqEntry e;
00217         data.GetEntry(0, e);
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'a');
00219         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 1.0f, eps);
00220 
00221         data.GetEntry(1, e);
00222         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'c');
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 2.0f, eps);
00224 
00225         data.GetEntry(2, e);
00226         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'g');
00227         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 3.0f, eps);
00228 
00229         data.GetEntry(3, e);
00230         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 't');
00231         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 4.0f, eps);
00232 
00233         data.GetEntry(4, e);
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.call == 'n');
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.score, 5.0f, eps);
00236 
00237         CHPReseqForceCall force;
00238         data.GetForceCall(0, force);
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.position == 1);
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.call == 'a');
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.reason == CC_SATURATION_LEVEL_FORCE_CALL);
00242 
00243         data.GetForceCall(1, force);
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.position == 2);
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.call == 'c');
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(force.reason == CC_WEAK_SIGNAL_THR_FORCE_CALL);
00247 
00248         CHPReseqOrigCall orig;
00249         data.GetOrigCall(0, orig);
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 3);
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 't');
00252 
00253         data.GetOrigCall(1, orig);
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 4);
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 'a');
00256 
00257         data.GetOrigCall(2, orig);
00258         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.position == 5);
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(orig.call == 'g');
00260 
00261 }
